description:
Add a little insurance to your adventure plans with the up-for-anything Vidda Pro Trousers. Fjallraven’s G-1000 fabric is tough enough to stand up to the elements or let you scramble up to a viewpoint. Articulated knees allow movement, useful for trails or trying to sleep on the plane. Adjustable cuffs help you get the fit just right, making it easy to stay comfortable through long layovers and multi-day adventures.

  • Constructed from hardwearing, wind- and water-resistant G-1000® fabric with reinforced knees and rear
  • Plenty of pocket space for your EDC needs
  • Articulated knees let the pants move with you
  • Adjustable cuffs keep you ready for adventure
  • Regular fit offers reliable comfort
name: Fjallraven Vidda Pro Trousers - Women's
